SELECT ch.char_id, ch.char_name, ch.char_nickname, ch.class, ch.class_name, ch.atk_type, ch.atk_type_name , ch.icon_file, ch.icon_x, ch.icon_y, ch.port_file, ch.port_x, ch.port_y , uw_name, uw_comt, uw_comt_02, uw_comt_03, uw_comt_04, uw_file, uw_x, uw_y , ut1_name, ut1_comt, ut1_comt_02, ut1_comt_03, ut1_comt_04, ut1_file, ut1_x, ut1_y , ut2_name, ut2_comt, ut2_comt_02, ut2_comt_03, ut2_comt_04, ut2_file, ut2_x, ut2_y , ut3_name, ut3_comt, ut3_comt_02, ut3_comt_03, ut3_comt_04, ut3_file, ut3_x, ut3_y , ut4_name, ut4_comt, ut4_comt_02, ut4_comt_03, ut4_comt_04, ut4_file, ut4_x, ut4_y , sw_name, sw_comt, sw_comt_02, sw_comt_03, sw_comt_04, sw_file, sw_x, sw_y FROM ( SELECT a.char_id, a.char_name, a.char_nickname, a.class, b.class_name, a.atk_type, c.atk_type_name, a.icon_file, a.icon_x, a.icon_y, a.port_file, a.port_x, a.port_y FROM tb_comn_char a JOIN (SELECT comn_code AS class, comn_code_name AS class_name FROM tb_comn_code WHERE type_code = 'CLASS') b ON a.class = b.class JOIN (SELECT comn_code AS atk_type, comn_code_name AS atk_type_name FROM tb_comn_code WHERE type_code = 'ATCK_TYPE') c ON a.atk_type = c.atk_type WHERE a.class = #{paramStr1} ) ch JOIN ( SELECT uw.char_id , uw.item_name as uw_name, uw.item_comt as uw_comt, uw.icon_file as uw_file, uw.icon_x as uw_x, uw.icon_y as uw_y , uw.item_comt_02 as uw_comt_02, uw.item_comt_03 as uw_comt_03, uw.item_comt_04 as uw_comt_04
, ut1.item_name as ut1_name, ut1.item_comt as ut1_comt, ut1.icon_file as ut1_file, ut1.icon_x as ut1_x, ut1.icon_y as ut1_y , ut1.item_comt_02 as ut1_comt_02, ut1.item_comt_03 as ut1_comt_03, ut1.item_comt_04 as ut1_comt_04
, ut2.item_name as ut2_name, ut2.item_comt as ut2_comt, ut2.icon_file as ut2_file, ut2.icon_x as ut2_x, ut2.icon_y as ut2_y , ut2.item_comt_02 as ut2_comt_02, ut2.item_comt_03 as ut2_comt_03, ut2.item_comt_04 as ut2_comt_04
, ut3.item_name as ut3_name, ut3.item_comt as ut3_comt, ut3.icon_file as ut3_file, ut3.icon_x as ut3_x, ut3.icon_y as ut3_y , ut3.item_comt_02 as ut3_comt_02, ut3.item_comt_03 as ut3_comt_03, ut3.item_comt_04 as ut3_comt_04
, ut4.item_name as ut4_name, ut4.item_comt as ut4_comt, ut4.icon_file as ut4_file, ut4.icon_x as ut4_x, ut4.icon_y as ut4_y , ut4.item_comt_02 as ut4_comt_02, ut4.item_comt_03 as ut4_comt_03, ut4.item_comt_04 as ut4_comt_04
, sw.item_name as sw_name, sw.item_comt as sw_comt, sw.icon_file as sw_file, sw.icon_x as sw_x, sw.icon_y as sw_y , sw.item_comt_02 as sw_comt_02, sw.item_comt_03 as sw_comt_03, sw.item_comt_04 as sw_comt_04 FROM (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'UW') uw LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'UT1') ut1 ON uw.char_id = ut1.char_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'UT2') ut2 ON uw.char_id = ut2.char_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'UT3') ut3 ON uw.char_id = ut3.char_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'UT4') ut4 ON uw.char_id = ut4.char_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT char_id, item_type, item_name, item_comt, icon_file, icon_x, icon_y, item_comt_02, item_comt_03, item_comt_04 FROM tb_comn_item WHERE item_type = 'SW') sw ON uw.char_id = sw.char_id ) item ON ch.char_id = item.char_id
